name: Warrior Tactics (Prototype)
description:
How To Play

 - Select a fighting force for yourself and the AI
 - Move and/or attack with each unit
 - End your turn and let the CPU go
 - The rules are essentially the same as Into the 

What This Is

This is an experiment to see if Into the Breach combat would be fun without the deterministic and telegraphed AI opponent. I think it did not turn out to be a good design, but put a lot of time into it so might as well let other people learn this lesson without any of the work.

Music Credits
